| Overview                = [[File:Pandorians (Earth-616) from Ka-Zar the Savage Vol 1 1 002.jpg|thumb|left]]
The '''Pandorians''', better known as the '''Cat People''', is a [[Homo sapiens|human]] hunter-gatherer society based in [[Pangea (Savage Land)|Pangea]] in the [[Savage Land]]. They live in the city of [[Pandori]]. The Cat People are in the periphery of society [[Lemurans]]. They worship and kill the [[Smilodon|saber-toothed tigers]] and other big cats.{{r|Ka-Zar the Savage #1}}
| History                 = 
When [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]] was looking for the lost [[Zabu (Earth-616)|Zabu]], the trail led him to a vast new section of the [[Savage Land]] known as [[Pangea (Savage Land)|Pangea]]. He met a woman called [[Leanne (Earth-616)|Leanne]] who owned a female pet saber-tooth, he rescued her from the Cat People who were trying to kill the saber-tooth.{{r|Ka-Zar the Savage #1}}
